test.create_query: CREATE TABLE perf_lc( str LowCardinality(String), arr Array(LowCardinality(String)) default [str] ) ENGINE = MergeTree() ORDER BY tuple()
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO perf_lc (str) SELECT concat('asdf', toString(number % 10000)) FROM numbers(350000000)
test.query: SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE str = 'asdf337'
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE arr[1] = 'asdf337'
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE has(arr, 'asdf337')
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE indexOf(arr, 'asdf337') > 0
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE arr[1] = str
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE has(arr, str)
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE indexOf(arr, str) > 0
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE has(arr, concat('0', str))
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE has(arr, concat(str, 'str'))
SELECT count() FROM perf_lc WHERE has(arr, concat(str, '0'))
